forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
The evening in Downtown San Francisco presents a mostly cloudy canvas, protecting the cityscape under a gentle veil. As the sun dips toward the horizon, temperatures linger around a comfortable 56 degrees, with a light westerly breeze adding a whisper of coolness to the air. The ambiance feels serene, a perfect invitation for a leisurely stroll, perhaps along the Embarcadero, where the lights of the Bay Bridge gradually illuminate the twilight.

Looking ahead to Thursday, the skies promise to clear, transitioning to a picturesque day. A high near 66 degrees beckons, with a gentle descent into the mid-sixties by afternoon. Clarity will reclaim its place, replacing the clouds with vast stretches of blue. Yet, the familiar marine layer will likely hide in the embrace of the coastal hills, a reminder of the ocean's presence just a breath away. Dressing in layers will serve well—light clothing for the warmth, complemented by a cardigan or jacket to fend off any lingering evening chill. With such inviting conditions, it’s a splendid opportunity to indulge in a mug of coffee at a sidewalk café, or perhaps to wander through local shops, soaking in the vibrant and dynamic spirit of the city.
